tool_description: Allow you to check the records of A, Mx, CNAME, SOA, TXT and more individually
name: DNS Checker
title: DNS Checker

api_list.name: DNS Checker

required_parameters.name: RdataType
required_parameters.description: A, CNAME, MX, NS, TXT, SOA and more valid Rdata Types.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://dns-checker1.p.rapidapi.com/api/dns/google.com/A"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dns-checker1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://dns-checker1.p.rapidapi.com/api/dns/{domain}/{rdatatype}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dns-checker1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
